response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which I believe has the potential to significantly enhance your business operations and bring substantial value to your organization. Given its exceptional capabilities and the impact it can have on your company, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire this product at a special price of $2,000,000. This offer is designed to provide you with a competitive advantage in the market while ensuring your long-term success. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this opportunity further.", "product_price": 2000000}
